alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:32AM CDT until June 15 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR WILCOX COUNTY... At 1131 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Thomaston to 4 miles southeast of Magnolia to near Surginer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Camden, Pine Hill and Yellow Bluff. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
